name: XSGD
short_description: XSGD is the fully collateralized Singapore Dollar stablecoin, powered by open-source blockchain protocols. All Xfers issued SGD-backed stablecoins have 1:1 parity with Singapore Dollar. On our platform, your Digital Goods Wallet balance is denominated in SGD. You may credit or debit this balance in the form of XSGD or SGD.
